# Platnum Construction - Tanzania

> Leading construction company in Tanzania specializing in building construction, road construction, and equipment rental services.

## About Us

Platnum Construction is a premier construction company based in Tanzania, offering comprehensive construction services including:

- Building Construction (residential, commercial, industrial)
- Road Construction and Infrastructure
- Equipment Rental Services
- Project Management
- Construction Consulting

## Services

### Building Construction
We specialize in constructing high-quality residential, commercial, and industrial buildings using modern construction techniques and materials.

### Road Construction
Our expertise includes road construction, rehabilitation, and maintenance projects across Tanzania.

### Equipment Rental
We offer a wide range of construction equipment for rent including:
- Excavators (Caterpillar, Hyundai, JCB)
- Bulldozers (Komatsu)
- Motor Graders (Caterpillar)
- Concrete Mixers (Sany, Qingnong)
- Concrete Pumps (Schwing Stetter)
- Cranes (Mitsubishi, Hino)
- Trucks and Transport Vehicles
- Roller-Compactors

## Contact Information

- Website: https://platnumconstruction.co.tz
- Email: info@platnumconstruction.co.tz
- Phone: +255 749 777 700
- Location: Tanzania

## Featured Projects

- Godwin Gondwe Secondary School Project
- Mbeya-Tunduma Road Project
- Dar es Salaam Commercial Complex

## Equipment Rental Rates

All equipment rental rates are competitive and include maintenance support. Contact us for detailed pricing and availability.
